articles.author: By  REUTERS
articles.title: Want to exercise more? Try setting an open goal for your New Year's resolution - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: Generally we’re advised to set specific, or SMART, goals (where SMART stands for specific, measurable, achievable, realistic and timebound). Aiming to walk 10,000 steps per day is a common example.
